message: After enjoying Demon's Souls WAY more than I'd expected to, I'm really excited for this. Who's with me?

Pretty great new trailer, showing, um, lots of dying: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eqaysjKcw-g The trailer also makes it quite clear that this really is, for all intents and purposes, Demon's Souls 2.

Also, it will have the same kind of Collector's Edition that Demon's Souls had, which you get if you pre-order. http://www.joystiq.com/2011/05/11/dark-souls-collectors-edition-offered-as-pre-order-bonus/
Great preview at Eurogamer: http://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2011-05-16-dark-souls-preview . "it's the Mario game we might get if Miyamoto ever goes through a reaaally bad break-up."
